_meta.title: Love & Romance 연애운/결혼운
_meta.description: Deep insights into romantic relationships, soul connections, and matters of the heart

The Fool.love_meaning: A completely new romantic beginning awaits. Be open to unexpected love that arrives in surprising ways. Let go of past relationship baggage.
The Fool.korean: 완전히 새로운 로맨틱한 시작이 기다리고 있습니다. 예상치 못한 방식으로 찾아오는 사랑에 열려 있으세요.
The Fool.single: Love may appear when you least expect it. Stay open and adventurous.
The Fool.relationship: Time to bring fresh energy into your relationship. Try something completely new together.
The Fool.timing: New love energy arrives within 1-3 months
The Fool.compatibility: Best with partners who embrace spontaneity and adventure
The Fool.advice: Don't overthink love. Jump in with an open heart.

The Magician.love_meaning: You have the power to create the love life you desire. Take initiative in romance. Your charisma and confidence attract partners.
The Magician.korean: 당신은 원하는 사랑의 삶을 창조할 힘이 있습니다. 로맨스에서 주도권을 잡으세요.
The Magician.single: Take active steps to meet someone. You have magnetic attraction now.
The Magician.relationship: Manifest the relationship improvements you want through clear communication.
The Magician.timing: Your romantic power peaks now - act with intention
The Magician.compatibility: Attracts partners who appreciate confidence and initiative
The Magician.advice: Be the creator of your love story, not just a participant.

The High Priestess.love_meaning: Trust your intuition about love matters. There may be hidden aspects to a relationship that will soon be revealed. Listen to your inner knowing.
The High Priestess.korean: 사랑 문제에 대해 직감을 신뢰하세요. 곧 드러날 숨겨진 면이 있을 수 있습니다.
The High Priestess.single: Someone may have hidden feelings for you. Pay attention to subtle signals.
The High Priestess.relationship: Deepen emotional intimacy through quiet understanding, not words.
The High Priestess.timing: Wait for more clarity before making romantic decisions
The High Priestess.compatibility: Connects well with intuitive, emotionally deep partners
The High Priestess.advice: Listen to what isn't being said. The heart speaks in whispers.

The Empress.love_meaning: Love flourishes around you. This is a fertile time for romance, sensuality, and deep emotional connection. Nurture your relationships.
The Empress.korean: 사랑이 당신 주변에서 꽃피웁니다. 로맨스, 관능, 깊은 감정적 연결을 위한 비옥한 시간입니다.
The Empress.single: You are highly attractive now. Love finds you easily when you're in your nurturing energy.
The Empress.relationship: Deepen sensuality and create a beautiful, comfortable space for love.
The Empress.timing: Love grows steadily - excellent for long-term relationship building
The Empress.compatibility: Harmonizes with partners who appreciate beauty, comfort, and nurturing
The Empress.advice: Create an environment where love can flourish. Be generous with affection.

The Emperor.love_meaning: Structure and commitment in love. This points to stable, lasting relationships built on mutual respect and clear boundaries.
The Emperor.korean: 사랑에서의 구조와 헌신. 상호 존중과 명확한 경계 위에 세워진 안정적이고 지속적인 관계를 가리킵니다.
The Emperor.single: You may meet someone through work or traditional means. Look for stability.
The Emperor.relationship: Time to strengthen commitment, perhaps formalize the relationship.
The Emperor.timing: Long-term commitment energy - marriage or serious commitment discussions
The Emperor.compatibility: Matches well with partners who value stability and traditional values
The Emperor.advice: Build love on a foundation of respect and clear agreements.

The Hierophant.love_meaning: Traditional relationship values are highlighted. Consider marriage, family traditions, or spiritual unions. Seek relationship guidance if needed.
The Hierophant.korean: 전통적인 관계 가치가 강조됩니다. 결혼, 가족 전통, 또는 영적 결합을 고려하세요.
The Hierophant.single: May meet a partner through religious/spiritual communities or family introductions.
The Hierophant.relationship: Consider couples counseling or spiritual practices together.
The Hierophant.timing: Favorable for traditional milestones - engagement, marriage, ceremonies
The Hierophant.compatibility: Works well with partners who share values and traditions
The Hierophant.advice: Honor the sacred nature of commitment. Seek wise counsel for relationship matters.

The Lovers.love_meaning: A significant romantic choice or soulmate connection. Deep alignment between head and heart. True love and meaningful partnership.
The Lovers.korean: 중요한 로맨틱한 선택 또는 소울메이트 연결. 머리와 가슴 사이의 깊은 정렬.
The Lovers.single: A significant romantic choice approaches. A soulmate connection is possible.
The Lovers.relationship: Deepen your commitment. This is true love - nurture it.
The Lovers.timing: Major relationship decision within weeks - choose with your whole heart
The Lovers.compatibility: Perfect alignment - values match on the deepest level
The Lovers.advice: Choose love that aligns with your deepest values. This choice shapes your life.

The Chariot.love_meaning: Pursue love with determination. Overcome relationship obstacles through focused effort. Don't give up on what you want.
The Chariot.korean: 결단력을 가지고 사랑을 추구하세요. 집중된 노력으로 관계의 장애물을 극복하세요.
The Chariot.single: Actively pursue the love you want. Take bold romantic initiatives.
The Chariot.relationship: Work together to overcome challenges. Victory comes through united effort.
The Chariot.timing: Push through obstacles now - success in love requires determination
The Chariot.compatibility: Needs a partner who matches your drive and ambition
The Chariot.advice: Don't wait for love to find you. Go after what you want.

Strength.love_meaning: Gentle patience wins in love. Tame difficult relationship dynamics with compassion, not force. Your inner strength attracts love.
Strength.korean: 부드러운 인내가 사랑에서 승리합니다. 강요가 아닌 연민으로 어려운 관계 역학을 다루세요.
Strength.single: Your gentle confidence is attractive. Love comes to those who are secure within.
Strength.relationship: Handle conflicts with patience and compassion. Love tames even fierce hearts.
Strength.timing: Patience now leads to lasting love later
Strength.compatibility: Attracts partners who appreciate emotional maturity
Strength.advice: Be strong enough to be gentle. Real love doesn't need to conquer.

The Hermit.love_meaning: A period of solitude or introspection in love matters. Understand yourself before seeking partnership. Quality over quantity.
The Hermit.korean: 사랑 문제에서 고독 또는 성찰의 시간. 파트너십을 찾기 전에 자신을 이해하세요.
The Hermit.single: Focus on self-discovery before dating. Know what you truly want in love.
The Hermit.relationship: Give each other space for individual growth. Solitude strengthens bonds.
The Hermit.timing: Not the time for new romance - focus on inner work first
The Hermit.compatibility: Needs a partner who respects independence and inner life
The Hermit.advice: Know yourself deeply before giving yourself to another.

Wheel of Fortune.love_meaning: Major changes in your love life are destined. Fate is turning the wheel - a significant romantic shift approaches.
Wheel of Fortune.korean: 당신의 사랑 생활에 중요한 변화가 운명되어 있습니다. 운명이 바퀴를 돌리고 있습니다.
Wheel of Fortune.single: A fateful meeting approaches. Love arrives through chance or destiny.
Wheel of Fortune.relationship: Major relationship changes - could be positive evolution or necessary ending.
Wheel of Fortune.timing: Significant romantic changes within 3-6 months - destiny moves
Wheel of Fortune.advice: Trust that the universe is arranging your love life perfectly.

Justice.love_meaning: Fairness and balance in relationships. Karmic love lessons. What you give in love, you receive.
Justice.korean: 관계에서의 공정함과 균형. 카르마 사랑 교훈. 사랑에서 주는 것을 받습니다.
Justice.single: Past romantic karma may resolve now. Fair treatment attracts the right partner.
Justice.relationship: Ensure give-and-take is balanced. Address any inequalities honestly.
Justice.timing: Legal/formal relationship matters - marriage, divorce, contracts
Justice.compatibility: Works with partners who value honesty and fairness
Justice.advice: Create balance in love. Be fair, be honest, be accountable.

The Hanged Man.love_meaning: Surrender expectations about love. See your relationship from a completely new perspective. Wait before acting.
The Hanged Man.korean: 사랑에 대한 기대를 내려놓으세요. 완전히 새로운 관점에서 관계를 보세요.
The Hanged Man.single: Let go of your checklist. Love may come in unexpected form.
The Hanged Man.relationship: Pause and see your partner differently. Sacrifice ego for connection.
The Hanged Man.timing: Not the time to push - surrender and wait for clarity
The Hanged Man.compatibility: Needs a patient partner who allows space for growth
The Hanged Man.advice: Let go of what you think love should look like.

Death.love_meaning: A major transformation in your love life. An old relationship pattern must die for new love to be born.
Death.korean: 당신의 사랑 생활에서 중요한 변화. 새로운 사랑이 태어나려면 오래된 관계 패턴이 죽어야 합니다.
Death.single: Old relationship wounds are healing, making space for new love.
Death.relationship: The relationship is transforming. Let go of what it was to embrace what it's becoming.
Death.timing: Major relationship ending or transformation within 1-3 months
Death.compatibility: Relationships that survive this become unbreakable
Death.advice: Let the old love patterns die. Rebirth follows every ending.

Temperance.love_meaning: Patience and moderation in love. Blend differences harmoniously. Take your time building lasting romance.
Temperance.korean: 사랑에서의 인내와 절제. 차이를 조화롭게 조합하세요. 지속적인 로맨스를 구축하는 데 시간을 가지세요.
Temperance.single: The right partner will come at the right time. Don't rush love.
Temperance.relationship: Find balance between togetherness and independence. Blend your differences.
Temperance.timing: Slow and steady wins - don't rush romantic decisions
Temperance.advice: True love is alchemy - it takes time to blend two lives into one.

The Devil.love_meaning: Examine any unhealthy attachments in love. Are you bound by fear, obsession, or codependency? Liberation is possible.
The Devil.korean: 사랑에서 건강하지 못한 집착을 검토하세요. 두려움, 집착, 또는 공동의존에 얽매여 있나요?
The Devil.single: Break free from patterns that attract the wrong partners.
The Devil.relationship: Address power imbalances, addictive patterns, or toxic dynamics.
The Devil.timing: Face shadow aspects of love now - liberation follows awareness
The Devil.compatibility: Warning of unhealthy dynamics - honest assessment needed
The Devil.advice: Name what binds you in love. Awareness is the first step to freedom.

The Tower.love_meaning: Sudden changes shake your love life. An illusion about love shatters. This destruction makes way for authentic connection.
The Tower.korean: 갑작스러운 변화가 당신의 사랑 생활을 흔듭니다. 사랑에 대한 환상이 깨집니다.
The Tower.single: Your idea of love may shatter, but truth emerges from the rubble.
The Tower.relationship: A crisis forces truth. Relationships built on illusion may fall.
The Tower.timing: Sudden romantic changes - expect the unexpected
The Tower.compatibility: Only authentic connections survive this energy
The Tower.advice: Let false love fall. What remains is real.

The Star.love_meaning: Hope and healing in love. After pain, renewal comes. Your faith in love is restored. Dream relationships become possible.
The Star.korean: 사랑에서의 희망과 치유. 고통 후에 새로운 시작이 옵니다. 사랑에 대한 믿음이 회복됩니다.
The Star.single: Hope returns. The love you've dreamed of can manifest now.
The Star.relationship: Healing and renewed hope. Your relationship finds its guiding star.
The Star.timing: Healing period - love flows more freely after recent struggles
The Star.advice: Keep faith in love. Your heart knows the way to its home.

The Moon.love_meaning: Confusion or illusion in love. Not all is as it seems. Trust your intuition, but wait for clarity before major decisions.
The Moon.korean: 사랑에서의 혼란 또는 환상. 모든 것이 보이는 대로가 아닙니다. 직감을 믿되 중요한 결정 전에 명확성을 기다리세요.
The Moon.single: Someone may not be who they seem. Trust your gut feelings.
The Moon.relationship: Hidden feelings or deception may surface. Seek clarity together.
The Moon.timing: Wait for the fog to clear - don't make major romantic decisions now
The Moon.compatibility: Be careful of projections and illusions in new connections
The Moon.advice: Navigate with intuition. The truth will reveal itself in time.

The Sun.love_meaning: Joy, clarity, and celebration in love. Happiness radiates in your relationships. Love is simple, warm, and true.
The Sun.korean: 사랑에서의 기쁨, 명확성, 축하. 행복이 당신의 관계에서 발산됩니다.
The Sun.single: Love comes with joy and ease. Happy meetings, clear connections.
The Sun.relationship: A period of happiness and clarity. Celebrate your love.
The Sun.timing: Excellent for romance - love shines brightly now
The Sun.advice: Let love be simple and joyful. Don't complicate what is pure.

Judgement.love_meaning: A calling in love. Past relationships may return for resolution. Answer the call to authentic love.
Judgement.korean: 사랑에서의 부름. 과거의 관계가 해결을 위해 돌아올 수 있습니다.
Judgement.single: An ex may return, or you're called to a higher kind of love.
Judgement.relationship: Renew your commitment. Rise together to a higher expression of love.
Judgement.timing: Past love karma resolves - significant relationship decisions
Judgement.compatibility: Karmic connections - relationships with past-life significance
Judgement.advice: Answer love's calling. Rise to your highest expression of love.

The World.love_meaning: Completion and fulfillment in love. A relationship cycle completes successfully. Wholeness in partnership.
The World.korean: 사랑에서의 완성과 성취. 관계 사이클이 성공적으로 완료됩니다.
The World.single: You are whole and complete - from this place, true love comes easily.
The World.relationship: Your relationship achieves a beautiful completion. Celebrate this achievement.
The World.timing: Relationship milestone - engagement, marriage, anniversary, completion
The World.compatibility: A whole, complete partnership where both feel fulfilled
The World.advice: Celebrate how far love has brought you. You are complete.

suit_meanings.cups: The suit of emotions, love, and relationships. Cups cards are especially significant in love readings.
suit_meanings.wands: Passion, attraction, and the fire of romance. Sexual chemistry and creative expression in love.
suit_meanings.swords: Communication in relationships, conflicts, and the mental aspects of love.
suit_meanings.pentacles: Practical matters in love - building a life together, commitment, stability.
